greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of coefficients in expansion of (cos(sqrt(x)))/(1 + cos(sqrt(x))).
comment: Differs from A089171 in signs; see Formula.
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: For odd n and for n = 0, we have a(n) = A089171(n); for positive even n, however, a(n) = -A089171(n)
mathematica: z = 26; t = CoefficientList[Series[Cos[Sqrt[x]]/(1 + Cos[Sqrt[x]]), {x, 0, z}], x];
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 12 2016
